author: timbeiko
content: It was announced to be postponed to August today, I think: https://cbr.stanford.edu/sbc22/

author: sky.cactus
content: I feel like we should be planning conferences at locations least likely to suddenly change travel/gathering rules.

author: sky.cactus
content: That is, give strong preference to locations that have a history of stability in terms of what people are allowed to do when it comes to travel and interactions.

author: sky.cactus
content: Having conferences constantly be cancelled and rescheduled because the local government decided to change the rules seems like it would discourage planning for them.

author: sky.cactus
content: (I'm making the assumption that it was rescheduled because CA is crazy)
